lead_paragraph: DIMEN--Muriel. The Robert Giard Foundation mourns the passing of our esteemed colleague, Muriel Dimen, a founding board member and Secretary of the Board. We extend our sincere condolences to her family, and to her many friends and colleagues. The Robert Giard Foundation 1/3
